channel.title: Cache downloading
channel.description: Hey, ive spent hours making a website for my new server and i've just found out while making my webclient that my webhost dosn't support zip files. if i upload my cache to a differant website but change the link in the client will the webclient still work? or does it have to be uploaded to the same website as the .jar? thanks. p.s sorry for my bad english.

item.title: Cache downloading
item.dc:creator: @bloodloss-x bloodloss-x
item.description:
@bloodloss-x wrote:

ok thanks alot.
EDIT: can the client download the cache from dropbox??

Read full topic

item.title: Cache downloading
item.dc:creator: @rikkieneter rikkieneter
item.description:
@rikkieneter wrote:

no that doesnt mather cus as example if you using the client from dragonkk it downloads from armadyll.info/alex/cache2.zip but the webclient is still downloading the cache

Read full topic
